did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: History of the University Dairy Herd to 1958, circa 1959
did.abstract: This collection is a report that documents the history of the University of Arizona dairy Holstein cow herd. Topics cover breeding practices, and health of the herd.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections
